headline: Does FIS’s Higher Dividend and Automation Push Reveal a Sharper Post Spin Off Focus?
summary: Fidelity National Information Services, Inc. recently raised its regular quarterly dividend by 10% to US$0.44 per common share, payable on March 24, 2026, to shareholders of record as of March 10, 2026, while also introducing its Asset Servicing Management Suite to automate key asset-servicing functions. Together, the higher dividend and new platform underscore FIS’s effort to streamline its post–spin-off business around core banking and capital markets technology with an emphasis on...
